metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a Gur Hunter at the Gur Camp in Wyrm's Crossing
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur CampApproach the camp and talk to Gur Leader and the Entrance Guard.Click on this Gur Hunter.

0.speaker: Pumler Grejit
0.text: It is good to have you with us. There is something rotten at the heart of this city and it needs purging.

1.speaker: Pumler Grejit
1.text: I hope you will take everything from the vampires, as they have taken everything from us.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *The hunter has nothing to say to you. He seems to have other things on his mind.*
